title: Privacy Policy
introduction: Estatemar ("we," "us," or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services and website. Please review it carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content:
We may collect the following categories of information about you:

Personal Information: This includes data such as your name, email address, contact information, and payment details, which may be collected when you register for an account, complete transactions, or otherwise interact with our services.

Usage Data: We collect information about how you interact with our site, including your IP address, device information, browsing behavior, and the pages you visit. This data helps us understand user engagement and improve our services.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We may use cookies, web beacons, and similar tracking technologies to enhance site performance, understand usage patterns, and deliver tailored content. You can manage cookie preferences via your browser settings, but disabling cookies may impact your experience on our site.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content:
We use the information we collect to:

Provide and Manage Services: Facilitate your access to our services, manage transactions, and ensure the smooth operation of our platform.

Enhance User Experience: Customize and improve your experience on our site, including through personalized content, recommendations, and site functionality.

Communicate with You: Send updates, respond to inquiries, and deliver promotional offers with your consent.

Legal Compliance: Comply with applicable legal requirements, enforce our Terms of Use, and protect against fraud or unauthorized activities.

sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
sharing.content:
We do not sell your personal information. However, we may share your data in the following scenarios:

Trusted Third-Party Service Providers: We work with third parties to support our platform's operations, such as payment processing, customer support, and analytics. These service providers are authorized to use your information only as necessary to perform their services for us and must keep your information confidential.

Compliance with Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information if required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or governmental requests.

Protecting Rights and Preventing Harm: We may disclose your information to enforce our policies, prevent harm, and respond to security incidents or other unlawful activities.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures designed to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, please understand that no security system is infallible, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights.content:
Depending on your location and applicable laws, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

Access and Rectification: You may request to access or update your personal information held by us.

Deletion and Erasure: You have the right to request that we delete or remove your personal data, subject to legal retention requirements.

Opt-Out of Marketing Communications: You can opt out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions included in our emails or contacting us directly.

To exercise these rights or if you have any questions regarding your personal data, please contact us at info@estatemar.com.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your use of our website, help us understand visitor engagement, and offer personalized content. You can manage your cookie preferences by adjusting your browser settings, although some site features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our Platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before engaging with their services.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be effective upon posting the revised policy on our site, with an updated "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed of any updates.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or our data handling practices, please contact us at: Email: info@estatemar.com
